parametrized_description: Determine the number of beam bridges and truss bridges to maximize the total mass supported, given that the total number of Popsicle sticks used for beam bridges and truss bridges does not exceed TotalPopsicleSticks, the total units of glue used for beam bridges and truss bridges does not exceed TotalGlue, the number of truss bridges does not exceed MaxTrussBridges, and the number of beam bridges is greater than the number of truss bridges.

TotalPopsicleSticks.description: Total number of Popsicle sticks available

PopsicleSticksPerBeamBridge.description: Number of Popsicle sticks required to build one beam bridge

PopsicleSticksPerTrussBridge.description: Number of Popsicle sticks required to build one truss bridge

GluePerBeamBridge.description: Units of glue required to build one beam bridge

GluePerTrussBridge.description: Units of glue required to build one truss bridge

MaxTrussBridges.description: Maximum number of truss bridges that can be built

MassPerBeamBridge.description: Mass that one beam bridge can hold

MassPerTrussBridge.description: Mass that one truss bridge can hold

BeamBridges.description: The number of beam bridges to build

TrussBridges.description: The number of truss bridges to build

constraints.description: The total number of Popsicle sticks used for beam bridges and truss bridges does not exceed TotalPopsicleSticks.
The total units of glue used for beam bridges and truss bridges does not exceed TotalGlue.
The number of truss bridges does not exceed MaxTrussBridges.
The number of beam bridges is greater than the number of truss bridges.

objective.description: Maximize the total mass supported, which is the sum of the mass supported by beam bridges and truss bridges.
